page.title: 08Population of north: FINTRY
page.content: The western end of the Fintry Hills occupies half of the eastern area and is almost uninhabited. Part of the Council estate near the school has 12 residences, Fintry Hills Estate to the north has 50. The Ross Caravan Park's 23 permanent households and the 23 more distant farms etc. also count as Fintry.{60% of households are families {50% with children under 16. Retired {people form 78% on the estates & 39% {elsewhere.} {Total Pop. 332. Labour Market 155. 30% work in Glasgow. 30% work locally. 21 in their own businesses & 8 employ family help. 13 are managers, consultants or contractors, 21 are in education, 14 in medicine and 8 in engineering. { {About 60% of all Fintry Folk are Scots {with as many English as Glaswegian.
